scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix frontend & python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.dev-prod: npm run prod --prefix frontend & python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.prod: npm run prod --prefix frontend & python3 manage.py runserver
scripts.migrate: python3 manage.py makemigrations app && python3 manage.py migrate
